title: About Me
description: This responsive single page application highlights some info about me.  It's built with react.js, materialize css and I have also used d3.js for skills visualization

title: Recipes Box
description: This is simple responsive crud web application, where you can add, delete, edit recipes, built with react.js and materialize.css

title: Heat Map
description: The Map shows average monthly global temperature for past 250 years. It's build with d3.js

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Game is played against computer,which has purposefully left some weaknesses. Try, if you can beat him (or her )

title: Simon game
description: In the game, you examine your memory. if you reach at 21 step, you will win. game hast strict mode, where sequence will restart, if mistake is made

title: Local Weather
description: It shows the local weather based on your location, if this data cannot be retrieved, then app prompts for city name. One cool feature is that, it tells, if weather change is expected  in near future
